prompt: A vibrant and whimsical underwater scene featuring a patch of glowing anemones in a Great Undersea Reef. The anemones have a bioluminescent glow, with a variety of colors ranging from soft blues to vivid pinks. Small, playful fish dart around this underwater garden, adding to the sense of motion and life. The coral formations in the background are diverse and intricate, showcasing an array of shapes and sizes. The light filtering through the water creates a shimmering effect, casting a magical aura over the entire scene. The art style is bright and detailed, capturing the enchanting beauty of a coral reef filled with life and color.
